import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { ThemeContext } from "./../App"; import { SUPTable1, SUPli, SUPContainer, SUPthVertical, SUPList, SUPtd, SUPTitleText, SUPaTag, SUPRow2, SUPRow2Col1, SUPRow2Col2, } from "./styles"; import { FiPaperclip } from "react-icons/fi"; import { SiGmail } from "react-icons/si"; import { GiBookshelf } from "react-icons/gi"; import { FaMediumM, FaUniversity, FaRegCalendarAlt, FaGoogleDrive, } from "react-icons/fa"; const UniversityPage = () => { const { setTheme, theme } = useContext(ThemeContext); const openNewTab = (url) => { window.open(url, "_blank", "noreferrer"); }; return ( {"\u00A0 "} University - Geral - - Outros - {"\u00A0 "}Email {"\u00A0 "}Nova FCT {"\u00A0 "}Clip {"\u00A0 "}Calendário {"\u00A0 "}Moodle {"\u00A0 "}Google Drive



Disciplinas: {/* Coffee Tea Milk */} ); }; export default UniversityPage;
